title: Blockbuster July Jobs Numbers, Employment Trends
itunes:title: Blockbuster July Jobs Numbers, Employment Trends
description:
Becky Frankiewicz, President at ManpowerGroup North America, discusses July jobs numbers and employment trends. Ben Armstrong, Founder of BitBoy Crypto talks about investing in cryptocurrency. Ryan LaSalle, Senior Managing Director of Accenture Security North America, discusses hiring in the cyber security field. And we Drive to the Close with Quincy Krosby, Chief Equity Strategist at LPL Financial. 

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld Producer: Sara Livezey

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
